extendedInfo.description: The cutest game on social networks comes to your mobile device!- No Internet connection required! Play wherever and whenever you want!- Play in English, German, Spanish or Russian!- Regular updates! Unique content added with each and every one of them!- Discover more than 150 magic plants and trees. Plant, tend and harvest your way to the heights of arcane wisdom- Tame 100 cute animals including Unicorns, Peacocks and Dragons- Use sophisticated equipment to brew potions and carry out alchemical experiments- Decorate your farm with numerous enchanted items - Get ready for a lot of interesting quests and achievements Install the game now and take ownership of your own Fairy Farm! Visit our game group (http://on.fb.me/IL5vJQ) to learn about latest news, sales and announcements.Copyright (c) 2011-2013 Startek Invest Limited

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Such a fun game!  Simple but enjoyable ^^
reviews.author: April K.

reviews.title: Too hard to get crystals!
reviews.comment: You need crystals for everything. I have completed enough offers to get 100+ crystals and received almost none of them. I\'ve been complaining for a month now. Ready to uninstall the game because w/o crystals you can\'t do anything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting gameplay. Will have you hooked on!
reviews.comment: Loved it The music, the gameplay are all good. Would love to see some more quick quests ingame
reviews.author: souvik mukherjee

reviews.title: It took my stuff
reviews.comment: I have been playing this game a long time and today when I went to start playing all my things were gone. My money my animals my crystals everything. I know you can tell how long someone has been playing please fix this I worked very hard to get all the crystals to buy the animals I needed
reviews.author: Afton Bulen

reviews.title: Expansion problems
reviews.comment: I\'d rate 5 if I didn\'t have to spend so much to make my farm bigger. It barely gets any bigger.
reviews.author: Amber Houser

reviews.title: ImPrajapati@Facebook.com
reviews.comment: Hello friends.I wanna sell my farm........ If anyone interested to buy ,contact me .......... I have 7000+ crystals,125+ animals n all the buildings,trees.........
reviews.author: Arvind Kumar

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Its a great game bt m nt able to get offers as many r nt compatible with my cell.
reviews.author: sadhna tiwari

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Runs well on my phone, does what want. I have no complaints.
reviews.author: Janine Terrell

reviews.title: Birch737
reviews.comment: Has anyone tried to hatch the rainbow egg yet? U are supposed to get a rainbow dragon. But instead I got a parrot.  Just wanted to know if this happened to anyone else
reviews.author: Tina Birch

reviews.title: Lost plants
reviews.comment: is the game designed to hide some plants and even accessories when the game level changed? me and my friend are on the same level but she doesnt have some accessories that I have and vise versa. Is the availability of the offer depends on the quest completed?
reviews.author: Shally Del Castillo

reviews.comment: Fun game, some of the actions are not taking effect though. Definitely a good game overall.\tDefinitely a good game overall.
reviews.author: Tamela Kroiss

reviews.title: Fans
reviews.comment: I love this game. I played this on my galaxy y b4, i cant hardly put it down. Lol. Now i wl play this in my galaxy s.
reviews.author: Rosalie Nedroda

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: So far so good . I\'ve only played for a very short while. So I\'ll come back after a couple days and give another review
reviews.author: sonja stroup

reviews.title: Genie does not work right
reviews.comment: The genie does not work properly in that the countdown constantly resets itself. I\'ve only been able to use the genie for free ONCE in the WEEKS I\'ve been playing. I\'m not spending anymore crystals on it; FIX IT. Otherwise, this is a fun farming game.
reviews.author: Lindsey Wolfe

reviews.title: Good game ever!
reviews.comment: Good. I can spread my own land. But its so hard to get crystal without pay???  But good game ever!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game Gone BAD!!!
reviews.comment: I will no longer play this favorite of mine because of how RIDICULOUS Its become. I am lucky if updates load properly,  you need an absurd amount of crystals to complete quests and the offers don\'t even load ! Every update brings me closer to walking away!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addicting, but frustrating
reviews.comment: The game itself is fun and addicting, however there are some things that I don\'t like. Such as the genie does not keep accurate time and you only get a free play every two days instead of daily. Also, I purchased crystals and never received them and did several \"free\" crystal offers and was never credited with the crystals. Now the game is not accurately counting process in quests. And I am quite sure that I have been missing crystals a few times.
reviews.author: Kristin French

reviews.comment: Its little slow going and it would be nice if items(animals,plants ect.) Were assure to get-earn
reviews.author: Julene Merrick

reviews.title: Offers dont give crystals
reviews.comment: Going on a month now that I have completed offers and received no crystals. Had top give out personal info to complete offers. Fairy farm is well aware and refuses to credit the crystals owed to me. THIS GAME IS A SCAM TO GET PERSONAL INFO BASED ON FALSE AGREEMENTS FOR CRYSTALS...DON\'T DOWNLOAD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: This is a nice game but it takes a long time to get stuff, and I\'ve tried to get free Cristal\'s but never get them .
reviews.author: sabrina grimmenga
